title: Alaska: a modern frontier
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Eskimos - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Alaska - Description and travel
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Social change
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Transportation - Social aspects
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Express highways - Social aspects

description: Alaska is not all snow, but a modern country with modern cities, housing and farming with a highway now linking it to the United States. This film shows of the progress made and comments on the progress still to come.
